meta.title: ProCode Ind — Professional code industry
meta.description: Tailored tech solutions: from simple apps to complex enterprise architectures, with cloud deployments that truly scale.

hero.headline: From concept to cloud: software that scales with you
hero.sub: From simple apps to complex platforms: robust backends, microservices and cloud to power your business in POS, e-commerce and data.

a.title: Architecture & Cloud
a.desc: Architecture design and deployment: Blueprints, Kubernetes, CI/CD, observability and cost optimization.

b.title: Robust Backends
b.desc: Modular and scalable APIs in NestJS, FastAPI or Go, integrated with PostgreSQL, Redis and RabbitMQ.

c.title: Products that Sell
c.desc: Market-ready solutions: POS, e-commerce and web/mobile apps focused on delivering results.

future.title: Moving forward together
future.body: ProCode Ind is a code industry. You bring the problem; we provide the infrastructure, processes and technical focus to build software solutions that scale with you.

footer.col1: From idea to product: architecture, development and cloud for projects of any scale.
